def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_darkest_grey = is_darker(x, None, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_x_in_circle = is_in_circle(x, ctx)
        if (
            check_x_large
            and check_x_darkest_grey
            and check_x_in_circle

    return results
